home.title: EOS block producer ratings and BP voting portal - EOS Rate

cover.title: Raise Your Voice. Rate Block Producers.

paragraph.text1: EOS Rate is an open-source dApp that allows EOS token holders to rate Block Producers (BPs) in just a few clicks. Users can access a rating system and voting portal, making it easier for token holders to make an informed decision.
paragraph.text2: EOS Rate gathers ratings to help capture a global collective opinion, or "wisdom of the crowd", and measure if voting patterns truly reflect voter sentiment.
paragraph.text3: To submit ratings, the token holders must sign in with their EOS wallet. This means that one account can only represent one rating submission per BP. The ratings are securely stored in the EOS blockchain to guarantee immutability.
paragraph.text4: Access the EOS Rate portal to submit your rating and make your voice count.

subTopic.title: Liquid Democracy
subTopic.paragraph1: Find the Block Producer that best represents you.
subTopic.paragraph2: EOS Rate was built by a community that believes in transparency. The tool generates profile pages for each Block Producer.  Using a unique radial component we call “LEAF” (Liquid EOS Attribute Factors) to compare the most relevant qualitative attributes of BPs visually.
subTopic.subtitle: Start Rating Now!
subTopic.text: If you have any questions or observations, please let us know through our

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: Compliance with disclosure of ownership, complete bp.json, use of rewards, and financial stats.
